sentences.en: She deftly wove the flowers into a garland.
sentences.cn: 她灵巧地把花编成了一个花环。

sentences.en: The bride said, "Run first, and bring me my garland that is hanging on a willow in the garden."
sentences.cn: 新娘说：“你先跑，把我挂在花园里的柳树上的花环拿给我。”

sentences.en: It was he who had cajoled Garland into doing the film.
sentences.cn: 是他说服加兰去拍电影的。
